episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 426 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 426: Raging Oscars 2015 9 Year Anniversary Show: Sean and Jim celebrate 9 years of podcasting but looking back at some of their favorite moments and concepts from 2014 to early 2015. Categories include: who has had the best and worst year, team I would and would not want to be a part of, characters I would and would not want to team up with, supporting character I would and would not want to be, places in the DCU I would and would not want to live, top heroic and villainous moments, all based on the events in the comics.

Listener voicemail from Comic Timing’s Ian Levenstein!

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 400 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 400: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace: We are back from a short vacation with the first part of our anniversary episode. We are joined by long time friend of the show Art Lyon to begin the first of a 3 part look at films that are typically labeled "Bad DC Cinema".  Our first part looks at Superman IV.

Note: Each of the three parts will be spread out over the next month so we mix in current comic content shows as well.

SPECIAL NOTE: Eli sent us in a new song parody that we are using as our new closing theme. Check it out at the end of the show with our reactions!

Listener voicemail return next episode!

Episode 295: DCU New 52 in 1 line (or as close as we get) Part 2 of 2: Jim and Sean wrap up a 2 part look at the entire new 52 as a summary of the recent few months dissection of all 52 titles. This episode covers the last 26 titles. We also chat about listener voicemails from Jesse and Eli.

NOTE: Our spoiler warning this episode is a contest entry from Eli.

5 Episodes to 300 and Knightfall!

episodes.summary:
Episode 158: Longtime friend of the show Art Lyon joins us in part 2 of a massive two part segment devoted to his recent work on Brave and the Bold 20-22. We also have some listener voicemail and an audio comment on Sun Devils. Plus more interviews from the NYCC.

Show Notes:

0:00 Show opening, heroinitiative.org,  DCBService.com, Instocktrades.com, our ongoing contest (Ragingcontest@gmail.com), show voicemail line 1-440-388-4434 or drnorge on Skype,and more.

5:24 Art Lyon on Brave and the Bold Part 2 of 2

1:33:52 Listener Voicemails and Audio comment on the Sun Devils by Ric Croxton

2:00:22 Show closing

2:03:16 Raging Reel : From the NYCC, a discussion with Free Lunch Comics.

We’ll be back in next week with our next episode.  Check Ragingbullets.com and the forum for regular updates.

Don’t forget to submit your own content for the web site and the show. We love your participation.

Art Lyon

http://artlyonart.com/

Bill Reinhold (For some great examples of the uncolored Brave and the Bold work, as Art mentioned.)

http://billreinhold.deviantart.com/

The Book Cave

http://thebookcave.libsyn.com/

Reality Wasted

http://home.comcast.net/~realitywasted/site/

Comic Timing

http://www.speakgeekspeak.com/comictiming/

Free Lunch Comics

http://www.freelunchcomics.com

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 157 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 157: This is a special bonus mini episode featuring content that didn’t fit on episode 156. We have an over 2 hour Speeding Bullets Segment where we discuss Battle For the Cowl #2, Secret Six #8, Northlanders 16, Haunted Tank, Fables #54, World of New Krypton 2, Action Comics 876, JSA 25, Green Arrow/Black Canary 19, Deathtrap so far (Up to Part 2 in Vigilante 5), Green Lantern 39, Green Lantern Corps 35, Trinity’s recent events, Wednesday Comics and more.

NOTE: Voicemails return on Episode 158

Show Notes:

0:00 Show opening, heroinitiative.org,  DCBService.com, Instocktrades.com, our ongoing contest (Ragingcontest@gmail.com), show voicemail line 1-440-388-4434 or drnorge on Skype,and more.

8:24 Speeding Bullets

2:27:05 Show closing

Raging Reel : Raging Reel, Voicemails, and Audio comments return next week.

We’ll be back in next week with our next episode.  Check Ragingbullets.com and the forum for regular updates.

Don’t forget to submit your own content for the web site and the show. We love your participation.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 156 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 156: Longtime friend of the show Art Lyon joins us in a massive two part segment devoted to his recent work on Brave and the Bold 20-22. Also joining us is Jason Page to discuss the Denver Comicfest and he gives us some insight on the behind the scenes of putting together a comic convention.

Show Notes:

0:00 Show opening, heroinitiative.org,  DCBService.com, Instocktrades.com, our ongoing contest (Ragingcontest@gmail.com), show voicemail line 1-440-388-4434 or drnorge on Skype,and more.

5:43 Art Lyon joins us in the first of a two part interview looking at his work on Brave and the Bold 20-22.

1:37:34 Comicfest chat with Jason Page, April 17-19 in Denver.

2:41:05 Show closing

2:44:14 Raging Reel : From New York, Jim has an interview segment about comics in libraries.

We’ll be back in next week with our next episode.  Check Ragingbullets.com and the forum for regular updates.

Don’t forget to submit your own content for the web site and the show. We love your participation.

http://artlyonart.com/

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 155 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 155: We celebrate 3 years of Raging Bullets! Jim and Sean discuss Watchmen: The Film in the second of a two part epic dissection. We chat briefly about the video game and motion comics. In Speeding Bullets, we discuss Superman 686, Wonder Woman 30, Batman Cacophony 3, Battle of the Cowl: Commissioner Gordon and Manbat, Green Arrow/Black Canary 18, Dead Romeo 1, Justice League of America 31, and Smallville’s recent Zatanna Episode.

Show Notes:

0:00 Show opening, heroinitiative.org,  DCBService.com, Instocktrades.com, our ongoing contest (Ragingcontest@gmail.com), show voicemail line 1-440-388-4434 or drnorge on Skype,and more.

8:54 Speeding Bullets Segment

1:42:40 Watchmen : the Motion Picture Part 2 of 2

3:43:55 Listener voicemails

4:14:37 Show closing

Raging Reel : Returns next week

We’ll be back in next week with our next episode.  Check Ragingbullets.com and the forum for regular updates.

Don’t forget to submit your own content for the web site and the show. We love your participation.

<p class="MsoNormal"><b>Episode 154 REPOST:</b>
Jim and Sean discuss Watchmen: The Film in the first of a two part epic
dissection. We chat briefly about the video game and motion comics. In Speeding
Bullets, we discuss Trinity 40-42, Green Lantern Corps 33 and 34, Supergirl 39,
Green Lantern 33, Batman: Brave and the Bold “Trials of the Demon”, Vigilante
4, and a quick discussion about Azrael: Death’s Dark Knight.</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">NOTE: There were some audio issues with the original release
of this episode so I went back to the source and rereleased it.</p>


<p class="MsoNormal"><b>Show Notes:</b></p>


<p class="MsoNormal">0:00 Show opening, heroinitiative.org, <span> </span>DCBService.com, Instocktrades.com, our ongoing
contest (<a href="mailto:Ragingcontest@gmail.com">Ragingcontest@gmail.com</a>),
show voicemail line 1-440-388-4434 or drnorge on Skype,and more.</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">7:20 Speeding Bullets Segment</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">1:17:58 Watchmen : the Motion Picture Part 1 of 2</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">3:12:00 Listener voicemails</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">3:32:56 Show closing</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">3:36:16 Raging Reel : Sensei interview with Sean Wang from
Runners.</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">We’ll be back in next week with our next episode. <span> </span>Check Ragingbullets.com and the forum for
regular updates.</p>


<p class="MsoNormal">Don’t forget to submit your own content for the web site and
the show. We love your participation.</p>

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 153 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 153: Jim and Sean have a conversation with Fabian Nicieza on Robin, Gotham Gazette and Azrael.  Speeding Bullets: Strange Adventures #1, Wonder Woman 28-29, Secret Six 7, World of New Krypton #1, Action Comics 875, Battle for the Cowl #1, Batman and the Outsiders Special, Smallville Infamous.  Also, we share some listener voicemails and more conversations from the NYCC.

NOTE: Our Watchmen dissection will begin next episode and we’ll be chatting Brave and the Bold with special guest Art Lyon over the next few shows as well.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 64 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 64: We had to put this one together quickly but it is loaded with content. We kick it off with a Speeding Bullets segment where we casually talk about a number of current books, jump into the Raging Oscars 2007 Wildstorm and talk about our favorite “hell yeah? books, creators and more, and finish off with Countdown 14 and 13.

Time stamps:

OUR 110th RECORDING!!!!!

We are proud members of the Comics Podcast Network and the League of Comic Book Podcasts.

0:00 Opening, special news, show announcements, NY Comic Con shout out (nywcomiccon.com), Gem City Comic Con (gemcitycomiccon.com), various rants, episode updates, and much more.

13:17 Speeding Bullets: This segment is a casual discussion on a variety of books including: Preacher’s first trade, Catwoman 72-76, Super Friends #1, Green Arrow/Black Canary #6, Action Comics 862, The Flash, The Killing Joke Hardcover, Fourth World Omnibus 3 and 4, Robin’s events up to 171, Batman and the Outsiders through issue 4, and a very casual on the events of Death of the New Gods up to issue 7 (Jim hadn’t read 7 as of this recording. Do yourself a favor and start picking up that mini.) We also discuss who we each think is the most heroic character at the moment.

49:52 Raging Oscars Wildstorm 2007

2:26:07 Countdown 14 and 13

3:41:38 Show Closing

Check the forum and web site for release details on Episode 65 which will feature a continuation of our Countdown Catchup as we head towards Final Crisis and DC Universe 0, we will also have some listener emails and forum comments, and a special audio comment on All Star Batman and Robin (We’ll probably informally chat some other current books). This will be followed by our Two Year Anniversary Celebration and will feature an indepth look and New Frontier, both the comics and the dvd.

 

Don’t forget to submit your entries for Where’s Whatnot Now, Bulletpoints, Funny Bullets and Top Bullets.

This two fans geeking out as we look at the most current issues of Supergirl 26, 27, very quick chat about All New Atom 21 and the new writing/art team, Detective Comics 842, Raven #1and a general discussion on the Titans related minis in general, brief discussion about upcoming Titans series, quick comments on Teen Titans Year One in general.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 51c : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 51c:  Countdown 36-34 are discussed as Jim and Sean explore what they are getting out of the series so far and make some links to what they want from the future. We also have a BK’s Bullets closing our Amazon’s Attack discussion. Bent shares his views and we share ours. We also look at the Epilogue threads and why we think it is important to where things are headed.

NOTE: Jim is on this episode via Skype because this was recorded after the hard drive crash.  We experimented with his headset mic this time for the first part and switched to the phone. We were deliberately checking the quality differences in sound to see which works best when we have to do this in the future. In the past we have only used his phone. If there are any sound quality differences from normal, this is why. We’re playing around to determine the best sound experience when we aren’t recording in studio. Thanks for your patience.

Time stamps:

Our 96th recording Part 2

We are proud members of the Comics Podcast Network and the League of Comic Book Podcasts

0:00 Opening, special news, show announcements, various rants

4:23 Countdown 36-35

1:13:16 Switch to Jim’s telephone from his headset mic due to sound hiccups. Please feel free to comment on the difference between the two segments as it is necessary for us to use Jim on Skype from time to time. This segment covers Countdown 34.

1:59:26 BK’s Bullets Amazon’s Attack follow up with reactions from Sean and Jim who continue the discussion with a chat about how it all ties into the future.

2:46:05 Closing, ads, next episode general info

Check the forum and web site for the next release (Episode 52) which will be a discussion with Art Lyon about his work on the very special JLA #11.

Episode 48 Part 2:  Basically almost two shows in one: This Episode Jim and I continue a two part long overdue discussion of Countdown 51-47: What works for us? What doesn't? How does it compare to 52?  What threads are we most enjoying and why?

We are also have listener emails and chat with Lord Shaper about a special gift he sent us.

Almost 3 hours of content. It's been awhile since we released a monster.

(NOTE: After the closing, there is another hour of bonus discussion) Donâ��t miss more with Lord Shaper on the normal blooper reel.  I left that discussion on the end because we get really off DC and talk Dr. Who but we had fun with the discussion so I left it on for those who are interested, rather than scrapping it.

We also talk informally about Batman, Detective, Batman Confidential, Green Arrow, Robin, Freddie Williams B-day, Blue Beetle, the Atom, Books of Magic, Invisibles, Papa Midnight, Starman, Grendel, the Shade miniseries the most recent Sandman Mystery Theater and more in just plain comic talk.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Special NYCC Report: A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Raging Bullets Special Report Episode 1: A DC Comics Fan Podcast

Special Report 1: Jim and I intended to record directly from the NYCC.
 We unfortunately spent all day and evening Friday in the Atlanta
Airport. (Yes, we live in Ohio and there is no reasonable explanation
why Air Tran trapped us here.  We decided that we promised you some
"live" content from the con.  While we can't deliver you direct con
reports at the moment, we can deliver you a special review of Brave
and the Bold #1.

We also recorded some special segments from the NYCC for you.  We chat
with Raph and Juan from Geeks United about the news from the DC NATION
PANEL on Friday.  Jim and Sean also discuss the DC Panel from Saturday
and some surprising news on DC Countdown and where DC is headed over
the next few months. (Special thanks to Ian Levenstein of Comic Timing
for his help with organizing Raph and Juan's help on the panel we
missed while stuck at the airport.)

We will be discussing the Minx, Vertigo, Wildstorm and CMX news on
future episodes as short segments over the next couple of weeks.  We
hope you enjoy our coverage of the NYCC.

NOTE: We are recording this episode on an Iriver in an airport.  While
there is some airport background noise, we hope you enjoy the content.

0:00 Opening and Notices

2:07 Brave and the Bold #1 Review

31:08 Spoiler Free for Brave and the Bold

32:09 Closing audio blog about our crazy day at the airport

36:05 DC Nation Panel news from Friday. Thanks to the Geeks United
Podcast and Ian Levenstein for their help on collecting this news.

55:53 DCU Panel from Saturday

1:23:03 Closing

We will be back by Friday Evening with the second part of our Legion Special

Monday Night will be the release of the Back to the Bullets Robin
special and then we will return to a weekly release schedule.

Check out ragingbullets.com as we have been working to improve the experience.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 41 Part 1: A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 41 Part 1:  This two part episode features a special “Speeding Bullets? look at some of the recent news including the 52 #37 DC Nation Reveal, the teaser photo that has been released, how it may tie into current books, and we also look at Smallville Labyrinth.

We also review Wonder Woman 2 and 3 and 52 weeks 35-38. 

NOTE: The Titans review will be coming during the next couple of episodes. (Not being vague on purpose, we have some special things planned but we will get it it) We moved it for 2 reasons, the show was already 4 hours long and we want to save it to discuss the first issue of the Titans East Arc.  We do have a brief discussion as we read this week’s forum comments on part 2 but we will go more indepth on that episode.

We also have an audio comment on part 1 from Geek Syndicate on our media episode and an audio comment on part 2 from Brent Kossina : BK’s Bullets looks at Batman Year 100 and he comments on Smallville.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 38 Part 1: A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
Episode 38 Part 1: This is a 2 parter due to length. Part 2 will be out on Sunday. Welcome to our year end special.  Much of the episode is in our normal format but Speeding Bullets the week is a relaxed look at 2006, both on the DC side and the Podcasting side.  This episode: Raging Bullets of 2006: Jim and Sean look at their favorite writers, books, moments, resolutions, and artists of 2006. Also, we review Manhunter #26 which was part of our Manhunter Challenge. Justice Society of America #1, and 52 coverage continues on part 2 which will be released on Sunday.

Our Speeding Bullets segment features a look at the Best of 2006, Jim chats about Checkmate and Secret 6 and Sean chats about Fables: 1001 Nights of Snowfall.

Audio comments from Brent AKA Knightwingbk on the forum and Comic Timing

(Flash Comics Issues 1-3) and we have our first audio comment from listener David Wallace on the Flash #6. Thanks for listening.

Episode 30: This episode: We introduce a new segment called “Speeding Bullets? that we would love feedback on.  We also review Martian Manhunter 1-3, Trials of Shazam 1-3, and 52 weeks 25 and 26. Also included are the usual, fantastic, email and forum comments.

ADDITIONAL NOTE: I took out our spoiler free summaries because they were almost identical to our reviews without the depth.  The big problem with this is that it makes listeners sit through the same segment again. Please post in the forum or email us with your thoughts on this. If there is enough demand, we will rework the spoiler free summary concept.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 7 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
This episode: We review Ex Machina 1-5, the OYL titles: Blue Beetle #1, Green Lantern #10, Green Arrow #60, and Catwoman #53. Also, we share some listener emails, our first audio comment, and give a shout out to our friends at the Comic Timing Podcast.  We proudly announce that we are now members of the Comics Podcasts Network. Keep up to date with us at ragingbullets.com.

Thanks to Matthew Guy for the Time Stamps:

Blue Beetle #1--1:00
E-mail/audio comment--12:00
Green Lantern #10--17:45
Comic Timing plug/E-mail--33:45
Green Arrow #60--38:10
Catwoman #53--51:07
Ex Machina #1-5--65:32
Closing Comments and Reminders 84:25

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 6 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary: This episode features reviews of Starman 0,1-3, Superman OYL parts 1-3, Supergirl and the Legion of the Superheroes #16. We also read some listener emails. As always, thanks for listening.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets Episode 5 Part 2 of 2 : A DC Comics Fan Podcast
episodes.summary:
This episode, we review the OYL titles: Robin 148, Birds of Prey 92, Nightwing 118, and Batman 651. We also read and comment on listener emails, talk about the recent Pittburgh Convention, and review the Vertigo title Loveless #1-5. NOTE: Due to the length of the episode, this is the second of two parts.

Robin #148 0:00:00
Batman #651 0:24:04
Loveless #1-5 (Mature Themes) 0:35:25
Closing Comments 1:02:41

Special thanks to Chris G. for the help with the Time Stamps.

episodes.title: Raging Bullets: A DC Comics Fan Podcast Special Episode 1

episodes.title: Raging Bullets : Raging_Bullets_Episode_1.mp3
episodes.summary:
Welcome to our first episode of a DC Comics Fan Podcast. This episode: We review something old in "The Shadow War of Hawkman" #1-4, something current with "All Star Batman and Robin: The Boy Wonder" #1-3, and something outside the universe with "School" #1 -2 by Brian Defferding. We hope you enjoy it.

Intro to RB and Hosts 0:00:00
Shadow War Of The Hawkman 0:6:43
All Star Batman and Robin 0:36:09
School 1:09:35
Closing Comments 1:27:45

Special thanks to Chris G. for the Time Stamps
